dc_description_s: Imprint derived from the atlas in which the map was issued.; Neele sculpt.; Numbered No. 42.; Shows boundaries, rivers and principal settlements; colouring shows possession.; Relief shown by hachures and shading.; Greenwich meridian.|51 x 60 Centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,000,000|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Drawn & engraved for Thomson's New general Atlas (Edinburgh)
